# Be Framework

> Objects don't DO thingsâ€”they BECOME things.

Be Framework is a PHP framework for ontological programming where transformation (metamorphosis) replaces procedural action.

## Documentation

- [Overview](/manuals/1.0/en/01-overview.html): Framework philosophy
- [Getting Started](/manuals/1.0/en/getting-started.html): Quick start guide
- [Tutorial](/manuals/1.0/en/tutorial.html): Emergency Triage example
- [Input Classes](/manuals/1.0/en/02-input-classes.html): Starting points
- [Being Classes](/manuals/1.0/en/03-being-classes.html): Intermediate transformations
- [Final Objects](/manuals/1.0/en/04-final-objects.html): Destinations
- [Semantic Variables](/manuals/1.0/en/06-semantic-variables.html): Domain validation
- [Type-Driven Metamorphosis](/manuals/1.0/en/07-type-driven-metamorphosis.html): Branching patterns
- [Reason Layer](/manuals/1.0/en/08-reason-layer.html): Transcendence

## Full Documentation

For detailed API and examples, see [llms-full.txt](/llms-full.txt)

## Repository

https://github.com/be-framework/be-framework
